title: All for One is Fun
body: If you have two friends to queue with!

replies.body:
{{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} 

Most people are like eh who is this and how do we play vs them and then you push with 15 ghost and 10 Yoricks when you ulti and they never know what hit em
I could say one for all is fun if Yasuo and Blitzcrank were just deleted forever.
pretty much, that way you can actually play something besides sona, tahm kench, brand, lux, and yasuo
I recommend Taric. Its seriously insanely OP and nobody sees it coming.
Perma stunned xD. Even more OP though lux.... Or maybe even Kayle the never ending ults. No one dies. Or maybe Soraka the heals.
yeah i can see that, except i'm never gonna get to without 2 other people xD

> [{quoted}](name=7ha7guy777,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=R8uMIVVF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-18T17:58:22.359+0000)
>
> With only one friend i managed to play 14 games of OFA with only 3 repeats (blitz, malz, and kayle). Blitz vs lulu feels so wrong. So very wrong.

I'd say for about the first 20 games, there's a lot of variety. After that... you see a lot of what you saw in the first 20 games, even though there's what, over 100 hundred champs? There are a few champs I've been waiting for probably 15-20 games to play, and still can't get enough people interested. I know there are people out there who would actually like to play wukong/vi/etc. I'm just not matched with enough of them in any one game. Solution? ADD TEAMBUILD. I'm probably gonna keep spamming this in threads until it catches on.
With only one friend i managed to play 14 games of OFA with only 3 repeats (blitz, malz, and kayle). Blitz vs lulu feels so wrong. So very wrong.
